trans-unit.source: Please select the data you want to purge or rebuild.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna las datas che ti vuls schubregiar u crear danovamain.

trans-unit.source: Automatically log in a front end user to index protected pages.
trans-unit.target: Annunziar automaticamain in utilisader dal front-end per indexar paginas protegidas.

trans-unit.source: Your Contao version %s is up to date
trans-unit.target: Tia versiun da Contao (%s) è actuala

trans-unit.source: A newer Contao version %s is available
trans-unit.target: Ina versiun pli nova da Contao (%s) è disponibla

trans-unit.source: The temporary folder (system/tmp) is not writeable
trans-unit.target: En l'ordinatur temporar (system/tmp) na po betg vegnir scrit
Chattà naginas paginas che pon vegnir tschertgadas

trans-unit.source: Please wait for the page to load completely before you proceed!
trans-unit.target: Spetga p. pl. enfin che la pagina è chargiada cumplettamain, avant che ti cuntinueschas!

trans-unit.source: Please wait while the search index is being rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: Spetga durant che l'index da tschertgar vegn recreà.

trans-unit.source: The search index has been rebuilt. You can now proceed.
trans-unit.target: L'index da tschertgar è vegnì recreà. Ti pos cuntinuar ussa.

trans-unit.source: Truncates the tables tl_search and tl_search_index. Afterwards, you have to rebuild the search index (see above).
trans-unit.target: Stizza las tabellas tl_search e tl_search_index. Suenter stos ti recrear l'index da tschertgar (guarda sura).

trans-unit.source: Truncates the tl_undo table which stores the deleted records. This job permanently deletes these records.
trans-unit.target: Stizza la tabella tl_undo che cuntegna tut ils elements stizzads. Questa acziun stizza permanentamain quels elements.

trans-unit.source: Truncates the tl_version table which stores the previous versions of a record. This job permanently deletes these records.
trans-unit.target: Stizza la tabella tl_version che cuntegna tut las versiuns pli veglias dad in element. Questa acziun stizza permanentamain quels elements.

trans-unit.source: Truncates the tl_log table which stores all the system log entries. This job permanently deletes these records.
trans-unit.target: Svida la tabella tl_log che cuntegna tut las endataziuns da protocol dal sistem. Questa acziun stizza nunreversibel questas indicaziuns.

trans-unit.source: Removes the automatically generated images and then purges the page cache, so there are no links to deleted resources.
trans-unit.target: Stizza ils maletgs generads automaticamain e schubregia alura il cache da paginas, uschia ch'i na dat betg pli colliaziuns a resursas stizzadas.

trans-unit.source: Removes the automatically generated .css and .js files, recreates the internal style sheets and then purges the page cache.
trans-unit.target: Allontanescha tut las datotecas .css e .js ch'èn vegnidas generadas automaticamain, recreescha alura ils style-sheets e schubregia silsuenter il cache da paginas.

trans-unit.source: Removes the cached versions of the front end pages.
trans-unit.target: Allontanescha las versiuns en il cache da paginas en il front-end.

trans-unit.source: Removes the cached versions of the search results.
trans-unit.target: Allontanescha las versiuns en il cache dals resultats da tschertga.

trans-unit.source: Removes the cached versions of the DCA and language files. You can permanently disable the internal cache in the back end settings.
trans-unit.target: Allontanescha las versiuns en il cache da las datotecas da DCA e da linguas. Ti pos deactivar permanentamain il cache intern en la configuraziun dal back-end.

trans-unit.source: Recreates the XML files (sitemaps and feeds) and then purges the page cache, so there are no links to deleted resources.
trans-unit.target: Recreescha las datotecas dad XML (sitemaps e feeds) e schubregia alura il cache da paginas, uschia che naginas colliaziuns a resursas stizzadas existan pli.
